name: PREFIXA
description:
Prefixa is a high tech company leader in image processing application development. We are focused on real-time machine vision systems, 2D and 3D interactive visualization application development and cloud based solution development. We have capabilities and expertise to develop novel IP and expertise with medical applications, cloud processing and GPU/CUDA algorithm acceleration. 
Our team has grown to near 30 software development professionals and we are looking for new challenges to expand our business. We are technology partners of important companies such as The Osterhout Design Group and Amazon AWS. Prefixa has offices in Puebla and Querétaro (both in Mexico) and Silicon Valley (California).
READ MORE...

locations.address: Paseo de la Villa del Villar de Aguila
